Topic.Title: Dear dicklicks345, Saying the same lie again every day...

Message.Msg: Old Sal Alinsky tactic: If you lie over and over, eventually people will believe you. Barack Obama & Company are PROOF of this! *** That was Obama's campaign. The consequences of THE BIG LIE -- wake up and smell the coffee.

just like the "studies" that "prove" Global Warming. They doctor all the reports, compare apples and oranges and lie if need be. I've read a lot on the vsubject and talked to people at the UC campus in San Diego that track such things. "Global Warming" AND cooling have occurred over and over in the past. It has gone to much greater extremes than anything we have seen in the past few hundred years. Long before man could have had any effect on it. "Igor" lied through his teeth as he teamed up with George Soros in a "Carbon Exchange". Had it not flopped both would have made many millions of dollars on our backs. *** Current civilization on Earth developed after the last Ice Age. Yes, the climate warmed up on Earth after the Ice Age. It had nothing to do with humans, gasoline exhaust or factories. Were you brainwashed at the University of East Anglia?

Message.Title: thanks to NY News-Journal
Message.Msg: that printed names and addresses of gun owners, a woman who successfully eluded her stalker by moving and disappearing from sight has now heard from her former stalker. Now he knows where she lives. Although she would have preferred to stay hidden from him, now she has a gun.

The temperature extremes go back much further than the ice age. Don't know why I even reply to estupidos that think they know something. Grrenland was much warmer a thousand years ago and simultaneously Europe had a "Little Ice Age". I can bet you don't know why. Greenloand cooled and Europe warmed since then. My education comes from acquaintence with knowledgeable people that aren't willing to compromise truth for money.

Topic.Title: "Social Security Has Nothing to Do with the Deficit" - Ronald Reagan

Message.Msg: It doesn't. LBJ started stealing money from SS during the 'Nam thing and it's been going on ever since. SS funds have been used so government can spend more. They will lie about everything. I took my statement showing all I had paid into SS an. d doubled it (employers cont.) then compounded it year by year by the average long term gain of the Dow Industrials. I started drawing SS at age 62 . At that time it would have amounted to $250,000. See what kind of an annuity you could have for that much money.
